name: Coach Signature Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 fl oz

reviews.name: Coach Signature Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: The scent of this perfume is too strong...it's a very overwhelming floral scent. I definitely would not recommend it.
reviews.title: 04 September 2013

reviews.name: Coach Signature Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 fl oz
reviews.title: sweet

reviews.name: Coach Signature Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: My girlfiend of two years love this fragrance.. she always gets complements and it has staying power. I like it on her too.. not too girly and not too stuffy. I always make sure she has this.
reviews.title: her favorite fragrance

reviews.name: Coach Signature Eau de Toilette Spray, 1.7 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: I love all of the notes on this, so it is no surprise that I love this. That said, I always get compliments when I wear this and people asking what I have on/perfume. It has an air of sophistication about it but is not one of those pretentious-type, snobbish-type smelling perfumes. Just a classic and very classy scent. Great I think for a woman in her 30's or above, but I am sure some younger women could and also do like this. To me it just has a slightly more 'grown up' feel/scent about it, but by no means an 'old lady' scent. I love fresh and clean-smelling fragrances, and this definitely fits the bill!! My only one tiny complaint is that it does not last all day. But the scent dries down and stays true to the scent you get when it is first sprayed. But I am happy to re-fresh during the day with an extra squirt or two, if needed. So glad Walmart carries this, this is almost half the price for this size as it is at other retail stores.
reviews.title: Timeless, classic, fresh, clean scent..love it!!
